CreatedDateTime.description: The time of prediction for next hour, it can also identify the bids or transactions in hours.
CreatedDateTime.title: CreatedDateTime

MarketRole.description: This version of Role is currently only for implementing in bid
MarketRole.title: MarketRole

Price.description:
The price of the buying or selling will be at first in bids provided from every building. But the final transacted
price will be by coordinator with multiple trading round determined.
Price.title: Price

Quantity.description:
Quantity will be at first in bids provided. After matching among buyers and sellers, appropriate matches will have
a certain quantity to exchange. One seller can sell its energy to one or more buyers.
Quantity.title: Quantity

bidCreatedDateTime.description: Date and time that this Bid was created

marketRole.description: An identification of a party acting in a electricity market business process
